data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字

Though, a ____ of ____, ____ and ____ on ____ are ____ to ____ and ____ the ____ affects ____ Parkinson's ____ create. In more serious cases where these therapies and medications in particular do not have an effect, surgery is an option (10).
data.partBlankContent: As the brain is affected greatly and results in progressive neurological deterioration, the symptoms and physiological affect caused by Parkinson's disease, as mentioned before are not curable. Though, a combi______ of medic______, exer____ and ha___ on treat_____ are us__ to con____ and red___ the adv____ affects th__ Parkinson's c__ create. In more serious cases where these therapies and medications in particular do not have an effect, surgery is an option (10).
data.fullContent: As the brain is affected greatly and results in progressive neurological deterioration, the symptoms and physiological affect caused by Parkinson's disease, as mentioned before are not curable. Though, a combination of medications, exercise and hands on treatments are used to control and reduce the adverse affects that Parkinson's can create. In more serious cases where these therapies and medications in particular do not have an effect, surgery is an option (10).
data.answer: 由于大脑受到严重影响，导致神经系统进行性退化，上述帕金森病引起的症状和生理影响是无法治愈的。不过，药物治疗、运动和手部治疗相结合可以控制和减少帕金森症产生的不良影响。在更严重的情况下，这些疗法和药物都没有效果，手术是一个选择。
